original_title: The Swordsmen: Live at the Faire
overview: Twenty years in the making! Since 1989, these Bold and Stupid Men have been putting audiences in stitches with their Rapier Wit and Thrilling Swordplay.  Here for the first time on DVD, the Swordsmen proudly present a full day of performances live at the Bristol Faire.
title: The Swordsmen: Live at the Faire
